dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. What do you seek, mighty necromancer?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no peace in the realm of the undead. What do you want?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the ancient crypts. Can you guide me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but power comes with a price. What can you offer in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you a rare artifact from the world of the living.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifacts of the living hold no value to me. Begone, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you my loyalty and service.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Loyalty is a fleeting concept. I have no need for your service. Leave my presence!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your power and claim it for myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a foolish mortal. You will regret this challenge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever comes. Let our powers clash!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravado will be your downfall. Face the wrath of the undead!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my impertinence. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies cannot undo your challenge. Prepare for your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you. I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Turning your back on me? You will not leave here unscathed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire to engage in your dark affairs. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dark affairs or not, you have crossed paths with the Necrotic Overlord. Prepare for your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave as you wish. My apologies for the intrusion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies will not save you now. Face the consequences of your intrusion.
